name: Out Of Stock Items In Work Order
report_name: Out Of Stock Items In Work Order

filters.label: Work Order
filters.parent: Out of Stock Items in Work Orders

filters.label: Sales Order
filters.parent: Out of Stock Items in Work Orders

name: Out of Stock Items in Work Orders
query:
SELECT
    wo.name AS "Work Order",
    wo.sales_order AS "Sales Order",
    se.name AS "Stock Entry",
    sei.item_code AS "Item",
    item.item_name AS "Item Name",
    sei.qty AS "Qty",
    sei.qty AS "Required Qty"
FROM
    `tabWork Order` wo
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry` se ON se.work_order = wo.name
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sei ON sei.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` item ON item.item_code = sei.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBin` bin ON bin.item_code = sei.item_code AND bin.warehouse = sei.s_warehouse
WHERE
    sei.qty > IFNULL(bin.actual_qty, 0)
    AND (%(sales_order)s IS NULL OR wo.sales_order = %(sales_order)s)
    AND (%(work_order)s IS NULL OR wo.name = %(work_order)s)
report_name: Out of Stock Items in Work Orders
